references.paper_title: Improved approximation algorithms for maximum cut and satisfiability problems using semidefinite programming
references.reason: This paper presents the celebrated Goemans-Williamson algorithm, which provides the best-known approximation ratio for the MAXCUT problem under the Unique Games Conjecture and is a cornerstone of approximation algorithms.

references.paper_title: Polynomial time approximation schemes for dense instances of NP-hard problems
references.reason: This paper establishes the existence of polynomial-time approximation schemes for dense instances of several NP-hard problems, providing a significant advance in approximation algorithm design.

references.paper_title: Approximating CSPs with global cardinality constraints using SDP hierarchies
references.reason: This paper presents a new rounding technique for semidefinite programming relaxations of constraint satisfaction problems with global cardinality constraints, improving the approximation ratio for MAX-BISECTION and influencing subsequent work.

references.paper_title: Improved approximation of max-cut on graphs of bounded degree
references.reason: This paper gives an improved approximation algorithm for MAX-CUT on graphs with bounded degree, showing that better results can be achieved by exploiting structural properties of the input.

references.paper_title: Beyond the Worst-Case Analysis of Algorithms
references.reason: This survey provides a comprehensive overview of the field of algorithm design beyond worst-case analysis, including online algorithms and learning-augmented algorithms, contextualizing the contributions of this paper.
